version_description:
Calendar 2017 - Now Available
Marriage Matching - Now Available
Beauty Tips - Added
Monthly Sheet - More Info
Daily Sheet - Modern and Classic Layouts available now
Dictionary - Tamil & English both available now
Baby Names - Now you can find baby names (male & female) with modern, classic, religious etc

App Crashes due to date issues - Fixed
Minor bugs & Minor UI Improvements

2018 Calendar Data - Now Available
2017 - 2025 Years Data - Also Available
Rasi Palan for Sani Peyarchi, Guru Peyarchi, Raaghu and Kethu Peyarchi for Year 2018 - Added

**FIX** Month Sheet Data - Now corrected
2018 Calendar Data - Now Available
2017 - 2025 Years Data - Also Available
Rasi Palan for Sani Peyarchi, Guru Peyarchi, Raaghu and Kethu Peyarchi for Year 2018 - Added

Year 2019 Calendar Data Available
Year 2019 - Important Days such as Marriage Days, Government Holidays, Fasting Days Available
App Stability Issues - Fixed and overall performance improved
App Experience - Minor updates on UI Screens, reduced navigation between screens and reordered important information

As new year arrives, we have brought the complete Tamil Calendar info for 2020, including Rasi Palan, Marriage Days, Government Holidays list and more.
Ohh yes, we have an interesting English to Tamil Dictionary packed along with the calendar. And you have got to read more with this calendar.

Alright, I got few important things covered in the update and many minor issues.

1. Back not possible from Daily and Monthly sheets - FIXED
2. Sani Peyarchi Palangal for year 2020-2022 - NEW
3. Minor issues Marriage matching, Numerology and Beauty Tips - FIXED

Here we ship a collection minor bug fixes along with additional info.

1. Theipirai & Valarpirai Info - Fixed Now
2. Muhurtha Natkal not displaying properly - Fixed Now
3. Back press from Daily Calendar Sheet not working - Fixed Now
4. Dictionary Data - Additional words added
5. New articles on Daily Sheet - Additional articles added

Here is another minor update with some critical bug fixes and two minor features.
1. Guru Peyarchi Palankal for 2021-2023 updated now
2. App is cleaned up to remove old calendar data

Bugs
1. Horai Timing Issues - Fixed Now
2. Raagu, Kuligai, Emakandam and Karnam Timing Issues - Fixed Now
3. Close / Back buttons not working on some of the screens - Fixed Now

Wishing you all a great festive season and a very prosperous new year. With this release, we have added,

1. Year 2021 Calendar Data (Good Timing, Marriage Time, Festival & Holidays, Daily Rashi Palan etc)
2. New Year 2021 Palankal for all 12 Rashis
3. Guru Peyarchi 2020-21 Palankal
4. Color-graded the screens such as Thirukural, Rashi Palankal etc

Wishing you all a great festive season and a very prosperous new year. With this release & the last one,

1. Year 2021 Calendar Data (Good Timing, Marriage Time, Festival & Holidays, Daily Rashi Palan etc)
2. New Year 2021 Palankal for all 12 Rashis
3. Guru Peyarchi 2020-21 Palankal
4. Color-graded the screens such as Thirukural, Rashi Palankal etc
5. Minor UI misalignment issues in Daily Calendar, Word of the day and notification handling issues - Fixed

Wishing you all a great festive season and a very prosperous new year. With this current release & the previous one,

1. Home Widget NEW - Now you can glance today's info from home widget
2. Year 2021 Calendar Data (Good Timing, Marriage Time, Festival & Holidays, Daily Rashi Palan etc)
3. New Year 2021 Palankal for all 12 Rashis
4. Guru Peyarchi 2020-21 Palankal
5. Color-graded the screens such as Thirukural, Rashi Palankal etc
6. Minor UI misalignment issues in Daily Calendar, Word of the day and notification handling issues - Fixed

Wishing you all a great festive season and a very prosperous new year. With this current release & the previous one,

1. Complete 2020 Year Events - Upto Dec 20, 2020 Added Now
1. Home Widget NEW - Now you can glance today's info from home widget
2. Year 2021 Calendar Data (Good Timing, Marriage Time, Festival & Holidays, Daily Rashi Palan etc)
3. New Year 2021 Palankal for all 12 Rashis
4. Guru Peyarchi 2020-21 Palankal
5. Color-graded the screens such as Thirukural, Rashi Palankal etc
6. Minor UI misalignment issues in Daily Calendar, Word of the day and notification handling issues - Fixed

Wishing you all a very healthy & prosperous new year. With this current release & the previous one,

1. Rewind 2020 Added
2. Home Widget Alignment Issues - Fixed Now
3. Year 2021 Calendar Data (Good Timing, Marriage Time, Festival & Holidays, Daily Rashi Palan etc)
4. New Year 2021 Palankal for all 12 Rashis
5. Guru Peyarchi 2020-21 Palankal
6. Color-graded the screens such as Thirukural, Rashi Palankal etc
7. Minor UI misalignment issues in Daily Calendar, Word of the day and notification handling issues - Fixed
